price: Sie sagten: Bei Allah, du befindest dich fürwahr in deinem alten Irrtum.
arabic: قَالُواْ تَٱللَّهِ إِنَّكَ لَفِي ضَلَٰلِكَ ٱلۡقَدِيمِ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: qālū tal-lahi innaka lafī ḍalālika al-qadīmi
